Status.description: The deployment status of control panel. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.
Status.markdownDescription:
The deployment status of control panel. Status can be one of the following: PENDING, DEPLOYED, PENDING_DELETION.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PENDING | DEPLOYED | PENDING_DELETION  
Update requires: No interruption

DefaultControlPanel.description: A flag that Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller sets to true to designate the default control panel for a cluster. When you create a cluster, Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller creates a control panel, and sets this flag for that control panel. If you create a control panel yourself, this flag is set to false.
DefaultControlPanel.markdownDescription:
A flag that Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller sets to true to designate the default control panel for a cluster. When you create a cluster, Amazon Route 53 Application Recovery Controller creates a control panel, and sets this flag for that control panel. If you create a control panel yourself, this flag is set to false.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

RoutingControlCount.markdownDescription:
Count of associated routing controls

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption
